items.name: Engineering-Machine-Learning-features-to-predict-adsorption-of-carbon-dioxide-and-nitrogen-in-MOFs
items.description: This repository contains the scripts for feature calculation and the machine learning (ML) models to the article *Engineering Machine Learning features to predict adsorption of carbon dioxide and nitrogen in metal-organic frameworks* by Zijun Deng and Lev Sarkisov.

items.name: NeuralMachineTranslationModel
items.description: Implemented two neural machine translation (NMT) models using different deep learning frameworks: TensorFlow/Keras and PyTorch.

items.name: minitorch
items.description: A machine learning framework written from scratch for educational purposes. Inspired by PyTorch and tinygrad.

items.name: niceml
items.description: niceML üç¶ is a Python-based MLOps framework designed to streamline the development and maintenance of machine learning projects, offering efficient and scalable pipelines using TensorFlow and Dagster.

items.name: plant_phenotyping_machine_learning_application
items.description: a plant phenotyping machine learning with defacto implementation of three machine learning frameworks and allows for the scalable management of the plant pheotyping data and also for the selection of the traits and the machine learning classifiers. it will also allows for the cusotmization of the machine learning models.

items.name: MLPro
items.description: MLPro - The Integrative Middleware Framework for Standardized Machine Learning in Python

items.name: edspdf
items.description: EDS-PDF is a generic, pure-Python framework for text extraction from PDF documents. It provides the machinery to use rule- or machine-learning-based approaches to classify text blocs between body and meta-data.

items.name: Optimising-Transaction-Schedules-
items.description: Implementing a quantum machine learning model to estimate the optimal transaction schedule.  Tech stack and Frameworks : Qiskit, Pytourch , IBM Quantum Composer, VQC

items.name: lagrange-dual-learning

items.description: This Application is build using Django Framework with Machine Learning Logic

items.name: TIGER-Plus
items.description: Model based test script generation framework with optimization of abstract test cases leveraging machine learning techniques and algorithms

items.name: House_Price_Predictor
items.description: My first ever project on Machine Learning for DevTown. Simple use of linear regression on Collab and flask web framework.

items.name: DecisionTreeOnTitanic
items.description: This project is built by analyzing the titanic dataset. The machine learning model can predict if a passenger survived the Historic Titanic Incident provided some of the passenger details. Flask framework with the help of Decision Tree is used to Built the Model. and the model is deployed on Heroku Cloud Platform.

items.name: MXNet
items.description: A from-scratch C# machine learning framework with no dependencies

items.name: Loan-Prediction
items.description: Machine Learning Project for Loan Prediction Website using Flask as a Backend framework in Python

items.name: Motorbike
items.description: Machine Learning Project for old motor bike Price Prediction Website using Flask as a Backend framework in Python

items.name: telecom_churn_prediction
items.description: In this repository, I've developed a machine learning solution to predict customer churn in the telecom industry, utilizing a diverse set of Python libraries and frameworks.

items.name: ecotyper
items.description: EcoTyper is a machine learning framework for large-scale identification of cell states and cellular ecosystems from gene expression data.

items.name: TENSOR-FLOW
items.description: TensorFlow is an open-source machine learning framework developed by Google Brain, primarily used for deep learning applications. With TensorFlow, you can build, train, and deploy various machine learning models efficiently.

items.name: Machine-Learning-
items.description: "Welcome to the Machine Learning Folder! Here, you'll find a comprehensive collection of resources, tutorials, datasets, and projects centered around the fascinating world of machine learning. Explore various algorithms, frameworks, and methodologies used in machine learning.

items.name: PyMLB
items.description: Machine Learning Benchmark framework for Python

items.name: Image_classification_using_CNN
items.description: The Animal Classifier Flask App is a web application designed to identify and classify different animals using machine learning models. This project leverages the Flask framework to create a user-friendly interface that allows users to upload images of animals and receive real-time predictions on the species.

items.name: Political-Security-Threat-Prediction
items.description: Political Security Threat Prediction Framework Using Hybrid Lexicon-Based Approach and Machine Learning Technique

items.name: micromatrix
items.description: micromatrix is a neural network framework for testing neural learning, a tool for understanding and learning machine learning algorithms and principles

items.name: RL_RoboTank
items.description: This is my reinforcement machine learning robot implementation for the Robocode framework.

items.name: spiking-learn
items.description: Framework for machine learning with spiking neural networks

items.name: MNIST-Experiment-System
items.description: The provided code implements a simple web-based experiment manager using the  FastAPI framework. This manager is designed to handle machine learning  experiments, specifically training and evaluating models. The system supports  asynchronous job execution, progress tracking, and model access.

items.name: django_project
items.description: This is a simple example of deploying machine learning model using django framework

items.name: Hazardous-waste-generation
items.description: A machine learning based and data-driven methodological framework to predict the generation quantity of HW at the firm-level in every month through linking different datasets across domains, which were used as proxies to indicate both static characteristics and real-time activities of enterprises.

items.name: Tensorflow
items.description: Dive deep into TensorFlow, one of the leading machine learning and deep learning frameworks, through hands-on coding examples and exercises.

items.name: brain_craft
items.description: C machine learning framework (focused on neural networks).

items.name: ann-framework
items.description: Task-agnostic machine learning framework using artificial neural networks

items.name: machine-learning
items.description: This repository contains experimental experiences that I (and my group) have conducted and is designed to support the provision of a framework and resources for those who want to understand, implement, and experiment with various machine learning algorithms and techniques.

items.name: semester-2-projects
items.description: This repository hosts a collection of innovative projects developed during the second semester, focusing primarily on the application of Machine Learning algorithms and Big Data architectures. Each project within this repository leverages advanced technologies and frameworks to tackle real-world challenges.
